2410.08874.title: Experiments with Choice in Dependently-Typed Higher-Order Logic
2410.08874.paper_summary:
Recently an extension to higher-order logic -- called DHOL -- was introduced,
enriching the language with dependent types, and creating a powerful
extensional type theory. In this paper we propose two ways how choice can be
added to DHOL. We extend the DHOL term structure by Hilbert's indefinite choice
operator $\epsilon$, define a translation of the choice terms to HOL choice
that extends the existing translation from DHOL to HOL and show that the
extension of the translation is complete and give an argument for soundness. We
finally evaluate the extended translation on a set of dependent HOL problems
that require choice.
2410.08874.paper_summary_zh:
最近，一個稱為 DHOL 的高階邏輯擴充被引入，
豐富了語言的依賴型別，並創造了一個強大的擴充型別理論。在本文中，我們提出了兩種將選擇加入 DHOL 的方法。我們透過希爾伯特的無限定選擇算子 $\epsilon$ 來擴充 DHOL 的項結構，定義一個將選擇項轉換為 HOL 選擇的翻譯，這擴充了現有的 DHOL 到 HOL 的翻譯，並證明翻譯的擴充是完備的，並提出一個健全性的論證。我們最後在需要選擇的一組依賴 HOL 問題上評估擴充的翻譯。
2410.08874.author: Daniel Ranalter et.al.
